title: Honor 5 - Can I Make It Before Season 7 End?
body: I just hit Honor 4 today.  It took about a month, I guess.  Is Honor 4 -> Honor 5 such a large jump that I won't be able to make it before season end?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Kishi Kaisei,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=j8o38oN2,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-08-26T06:48:04.966+0000)
>
> I hit honor 5 today.

How many games a day would you say you play?  Did you spam URF all month?

> [{quoted}](name=Final Witness,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=j8o38oN2,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-08-26T19:02:29.606+0000)
>
> How many games a day would you say you play?  Did you spam URF all month?

I did a count and i think i had 550 + games since honor went live and ya i spammed a lot of urf.
if honorable opponent was still available, it would probably help speed up the process.
There was no mention of honour level resetting at the end of the season so I'd assume it stays constant.
im guessing its a month based thing
